title: Kayn Release Date

replies.body:
Its during the patch not as soon as the patch is released. The have not given a specific date or time as far as i know.

*"Kayn, the Shadow Reaper will be unleashed on the Rift later during patch 7.14. In the meantime, learn more about the shadow and his scythe here:"*
Correct. Riot never releases specific dates for new content to be released (although they do tell you which patch).
I've been waiting since PBE to get my hands on Kayn. Seeing that it will be later in the patch was a knife to the heart :( And so my wait begins again.
its hard trying to select him ppl pick him to fast
can it goes out today thoug ?
Trying to figure out when riot will release content is like trying to figure out where your girl friend wants to eat.
I'm waiting for Kayn too, have the IP and RP for the champion + skin.
